title: League of legends christmas.
body: Is there going to be any christmas themed map on League now that winter is coming??

replies.body: We have Summer here in OCE.

^^
League did originate in the Northern Hemisphere though and for 3 out of 5 seasons there was a winter Christmas map released from memory. 
I spose each riot region is on their own buzz these days, so in OCE probably not mate.
